name: Lightswitch (ReaperMaga, Packsolite, Justin Mankowski)
description:
Description

You need to turn all the lights on to win the game, but be aware of the monster that is trying to catch you. If you get caught, you lose. I hope you will have at least as much fun as we had while developing the game. The monster can only see you in the dark, but be careful; if you get too close, it will smell you even through the light and kill you.

Controls

WASD - Move
Left Click - Interact
Left Shift - Sprint

Features

Smart Light Bulbs
Professional Monster AI
Clicky Switches
Easter Egg
